alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 04 at 3:04PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Arizona, including the following county, Pinal. * WHEN...Until 900 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 302 PM MST, local law enforcement reported that flooding is still occurring at multiple low water crossings around Arizona City due to rainfall from earlier today. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Casa Grande, Arizona City, Arizola and Toltec. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
